** running server
In two tabs.
https://github.com/rescript-lang/create-rescript-app/blob/master/templates/rescript-template-vite/README.md#development

#+begin_example
npm run res:dev
#+end_example

and
#+begin_example
npm run dev
#+end_example

** building
#+begin_example
npm install
npm run
npm run build
tree ./dist
#+end_example
